title: Various Artists - Caferino Albuquerque Vol. 4 [trip-hop]
description:
This is the 4th volume of Caferino Albuquerque, this time moving towards a more courageous, eclectic territory. Besides stuff like Bowery Electric that you might have heard before on my other compilations, there are some ultra-rare stuff like Rekhmire, Bitstream Dream or Blue Tofu that hasn&#039;t appeared yet on those other compilations. Not as biased towards trip-hop classics, Caferino Albuquerque Vol. 4 is varied enough to like to fans of more experimental trip-hop like R/R Coseboom or fans of instrumental hip-hop-ish stuff like Urchin or fans of Ninja Tune sonic explorations (see Rekhmire) and so on...
Enjoy!


tracklisting:
1. R/R Coseboom - Seabright (4:57)
2. Thorn Apple - Boardwater (4:02)
3. Belleruche - Northern Girls (3:43)
4. Blue Tofu - Chemical Cupcake (4:22)
5. Bowery Electric - Deep Blue (4:19)
6. Rekhmire - Jazz Attac (4:04)
7. Urchin - Ice Cream Van (8:06)
8. The Controls - New York City 1999 (3:00)
9. Bitstream Dream - Izi Likes Pancakes (5:11)
10. Lo-Fi - Roads (6:13)
